A pæan triumphall Composed for the Societie of the Goldsmiths of London: congratulating his Highnes magnificent entring the citie. To the Maiestie of the King. / By Michael Drayton. Drayton, Michael, 1563-1631.
[16] p.
Printed [by Felix Kingston] for Iohn Flasket, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Churchyard at the signe of the black Beare, London : 1604.
In verse. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-B⁴. The first leaf is probably blank; the last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
